page.title: 11HOUSING
page.content: Apart from the natural urban/rural division of the area it can be subdivided into areas bounded by main roads.Such subdivisions are influenced,in the main,by a particular style of home. The area includes{council-built {estates}as well as{private homes}built during the past two centuries.Much of the housing is{terraced}-the terraces being of varying lengths.{ {Semi-detached}homes are equally numerous.{Flat accommodation}is varied as is the{detached home. { }There are seven{high-rise blocks {of flats}in the area,{flats}in two or three storeyed blocks as well as {appartments over business properties. Many homes have been converted into pairs of flats.There was one example only of two houses being made into a single living unit. {CONTINUED.....
